venue.name: New England Center for Homeless Veterans

item.description:
Jan S. is hosting this event.

This has become a Sitz Annual Event.

Come join us in participating with The Boston Minstrels at their annual Christmas caroling and sing-along at the Veterans Center. Many Sitz members are also members of the Minstrels and we invite others to come and bring some cheer to our Vets. Our mission is to get them up and singing with us. You do not have to be a good singer! And if you are a musician, we invite you to play with us too!

The event is free.

We may be going to The Kinsale (Irish Pub) around the corner at 2 City Hall Plaza (Cambridge St) afterwards for a bite to eat or liquid refreshment.

Â
item.how_to_find_us: When you enter the Shelter tell the reception desk that you're with The Boston Minstrels.
item.name: Sing along with the Boston Minstrels at The Veterans Shelter
